## Course Overview

Every data science projects involve some form of data manipulation.
Let's learn some data manipulation techniques with R! The topics we'll
cover are:

1.  Data Frames

2.  The Tidyverse

3.  Subset

4.  Mutate

5.  Summarize

6.  Concatenate

7.  Joins

### Prerequisites

You should be familiar with the concepts covered in [R for
Everyone](https://github.com/UCSF-DSI/r4e) prior to beginning this
course.
